BackstoryDef.title: administrative clerk
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Bureaucracy is the heart of the Alexandria Socialist Republic. [PAWN_nameDef] was designated as a clerk upon entering adulthood. After years within the systems ofgovernance, a transfer was ordered; now [PAWN_possessive] administrative precision serves the colonies of the Rim.

BackstoryDef.title: state doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After the liberation of Alexandria, the reconstruction of the medical system was paramount. Doctors like [PAWN_nameDef] were elevated to positions where they taught dozens of students at once. As a state doctor, [PAWN_pronoun] became an essential pillar of the Republic.

BackstoryDef.title: people's ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The frontiers of Alexandria required constant vigilance. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] years patrolling the wilder reaches of the Republic, protecting communes from local predators and ensuring the safety of the rural workforce.

BackstoryDef.title: old comrade
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After serving for years as a member of the Sarissus Regiments, [PAWN_nameDef] retired with honors. Though lacking a proper retirement in the traditional sense,[PAWN_pronoun] uses the tactical skills of a lifetime to ensure the future seems less grim for [PAWN_possessive] friends.

BackstoryDef.title: civil engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After the revolution, thousands of homes lay in ruins. [PAWN_nameDef] joined the People's Reclamation Efforts, rebuilding corporate decadence into modern homes for theworking class. Block by block, [PAWN_pronoun] learned that building a house is the firststep in building a society.

BackstoryDef.title: Alexandrian sarissus
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: "Service to the people" is the motto of the Sarissuians. [PAWN_nameDef] took it to heart, making duty [PAWN_possessive] sole pursuit. A career spent in drill and defense has left [PAWN_objective] a master of the rifle, but with little patience for artistic expression.

BackstoryDef.title: ecological restorationist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During the Revolution, Corporate forces used chemical weapons to scorch the land.[PAWN_nameDef] chose to assist in restoring these ecological sites. While [PAWN_pronoun] refused to pick up a gun, [PAWN_pronoun] served the People by healing the world itself.

BackstoryDef.title: civil assistance corp
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Everyone did their part on Alexandria. [PAWN_nameDef] served with the Civil Militia, providing the muscle for massive state infrastructure projects. Though not a specialist in any one field, [PAWN_pronoun] is a reliable and tireless worker.

BackstoryDef.title: scavenger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] days picking through the ruins of former Corporate sites. While technically off-limits, [PAWN_pronoun] was eventually sanctioned by the government due to [PAWN_possessive] incredible knack for recovering vital components from the junk.

BackstoryDef.title: greenhouse engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the wake of the Flora Plague, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked by the Order with maintaining the massive sealed biomes that fed Bedwyr. Working in the artificial heat of the greenhouses, [PAWN_pronoun] learned the delicate balance between mechanical maintenance and botanical care.

BackstoryDef.title: oathkeeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: While Bedwyr was a world of chaos, the Oathkeepers enforced a brutal, rigid law. [PAWN_nameDef] joined the order with high ideals, but soon found [PAWN_objective] spending [PAWN_possessive] days sentencing desperate citizens for minor infractions. The work left [PAWN_objective] cynical.

BackstoryDef.title: apothecary
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As off-world medical supplies dried up, [PAWN_nameDef] joined the Order’s Apothecaries. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in cataloging the medicinal properties of Bedwyr’s remaining flora, learning how to keep the population alive with little more than weeds and chemistry.

BackstoryDef.title: steelsmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On a world where technology was failing, the ability to forge raw metal became a vital trade. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] youth in the Order’s heavy foundries, casting structural beams for crumbling cities and sharpening the blades of the Palantine Guard.

BackstoryDef.title: order quarter-master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed the Order's dwindling resources with a cold, mathematical precision. [PAWN_pronoun] tracked rations and equipment schedules, viewing the world through a lens of supply and demand. To [PAWN_nameDef], manual labor was beneath [PAWN_possessive] station.

BackstoryDef.title: georgiponic engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: On Bedwyr, agriculture was as much about architecture as it was about soil. [PAWN_nameDef] designed the structural supports and irrigation grids for the world's vertical farms. [PAWN_pronoun] values the long-term planning required to turn a barren plot into a harvest.

BackstoryDef.title: palantine ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assigned to the desolate borders of Bedwyr's territories, [PAWN_nameDef] lived a life of isolation. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time tracking local fauna and securing supply routes, preferring the company of beasts to the politics of the Order.

BackstoryDef.title: atmospheric engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] monitored the failing life-support systems of Bedwyr’s domed cities. Constantly chasing pressure leaks and reinforcing failing structures, [PAWN_pronoun] became accustomed to the sound of screaming metal and the stress of imminent collapse.

BackstoryDef.title: oathbound nomad
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Even after being exiled from the Order, [PAWN_nameDef] refused to break [PAWN_possessive] vows. [PAWN_pronoun] wandered the frontier settlements, trading [PAWN_possessive] skills with a blade and [PAWN_possessive] knowledge of livestock for a warm place to sleep.

BackstoryDef.title: slavemaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Production quotas in the extraction yards did not maintain themselves.[PAWN_nameDef] supervised labor crews and corrected inefficiency quickly. While [PAWN_pronoun] is an expert at commanding others, [PAWN_possessive] patience for "human elements" is non-existent.

BackstoryDef.title: mechanizer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Machinery failures were frequent and rarely well-documented on Belamunt. [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in keeping industrial systems running under extreme strain. Technical precision improved [PAWN_possessive] mind, but [PAWN_pronoun] finds human interaction far less logical.

BackstoryDef.title: sawtooth
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Cutting torches and reinforced blades defined the trade. [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] days dismantling heavy scrap and reshaping it into usable components. The repetition built immense physical strength and a talent for improvised weaponry.

BackstoryDef.title: forgemaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Industrial production structured most of [PAWN_nameDef]’s adulthood. Tools and weapon components passed steadily through [PAWN_possessive] forge floor. [PAWN_pronoun] values consistent, high-quality output over personal recognition or fame.

BackstoryDef.title: beancounter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Market shifts and supply costs required constant review to keep the legion funded. [PAWN_nameDef] tracked resource flow and adjusted projections as needed. [PAWN_pronoun] considers actual manual labor to be a waste of [PAWN_possessive] cognitive potential.

BackstoryDef.title: greenseeker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Marginal land on Belamunt demanded constant experimentation. [PAWN_nameDef] tested soil viability and monitored local wildlife to secure small but reliable yields for the frontline. Adaptability became [PAWN_possessive] primary survival tool.

BackstoryDef.title: legion vagabond
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Service never fully settled into permanence. [PAWN_nameDef] moved between detachments and temporary posts, maintaining combat readiness while living out of a rucksack. Stability was always secondary to the simple act of staying alive.

BackstoryDef.title: scrapper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned industrial facilities offered opportunity to those willing to take risks. [PAWN_nameDef] stripped structures for parts and rebuilt functional systems from debris. [PAWN_pronoun] values practical, greasy-handed knowledge over any academic theory.

BackstoryDef.title: trench dog
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Cavall’s trench lines shifted constantly. [PAWN_nameDef] spent years reinforcing crumbling walls, manning firing points, and advancing mere meters at a time through the mud. The constant hazards of the front shaped [PAWN_objective] into a decisive survivor.

BackstoryDef.title: improviser
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Equipment rarely arrived intact on the front. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to adapt broken tools and mismatched components to keep operations moving. Problem-solving became instinctive for [PAWN_objective], as failure usually meant a cold death in the trenches.

BackstoryDef.title: juryrigger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Circuit boards, scrap steel, and salvaged fasteners filled [PAWN_nameDef]’s workspace. [PAWN_pronoun] performed complex repairs with whatever was available, often bypassing safety protocols to get results. [PAWN_pronoun] finds that machines make far more sense than people.

BackstoryDef.title: revoked physician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s credentials were lost in the chaos of war, but [PAWN_possessive] knowledge remained. [PAWN_pronoun] treated horrific injuries in unofficial clinics with limited supplies. [PAWN_possessive] care is practical rather than polished, and [PAWN_pronoun] has a very blunt bedside manner.

BackstoryDef.title: backyard blacksmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Makeshift forges burned in the scattered settlements of Cavall. [PAWN_nameDef] produced blades and tools in small batches, refining [PAWN_possessive] technique through a lifetime of repetition. Craftsmanship is the only thing [PAWN_pronoun] truly respects.

BackstoryDef.title: fixer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Settlement survival on Cavall depended on constant, frantic repair. [PAWN_nameDef] moved between sites handling construction flaws and mechanical faults. To [PAWN_nameDef], reliability and a functioning heater are far more valuable than political ambition.

BackstoryDef.title: scrounger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Resource shortages encouraged thorough scavenging. [PAWN_nameDef] located usable materials in the most unlikely places and reinforced settlement structures with reclaimed parts. [PAWN_pronoun] has a keen eye for what others overlook.

BackstoryDef.title: trench bandit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Supply routes through the trench networks invited ambush. [PAWN_nameDef] relied on speed and close-quarters combat to secure provisions for [PAWN_objective]self. [PAWN_pronoun] learned early on that collaboration rarely extends beyond immediate necessity.

BackstoryDef.title: whizzard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Informal trade in Cavall required careful accounting and risk calculation. [PAWN_nameDef] tracked exchanges and calculated debts without the need for written contracts. [PAWN_pronoun] prefers the quiet isolation of numbers to the noise of the camps.

BackstoryDef.title: trench wolf
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Small-unit patrols demanded aggression and precision. [PAWN_nameDef] advanced through narrow, lightless corridors with rifle and blade ready. For [PAWN_nameDef], mission results and the pack's survival always mattered more than social camaraderie.

BackstoryDef.title: line officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Orders moved through [PAWN_nameDef] long before they reached the ranks. Planning patrol routes and reinforcing weak district structures became a daily habit. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that true authority comes from consistency rather than volume.

BackstoryDef.title: firetender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the frozen industrial blocks, kilns and furnace lines demanded steady attention. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to anticipate mechanical failure before it sparked. Long hours spent in the stifling heat left [PAWN_objective] with very little patience for delay.

BackstoryDef.title: ganger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Not all leadership on Coldharbour is official. In the crowded, smog-choked districts, [PAWN_nameDef] organized crews for protection and enforcement. [PAWN_pronoun] learned early on that loyalty is a practical currency, best spent on those who can fight.

BackstoryDef.title: gang leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A brutal dispute over territory forced [PAWN_nameDef] into a position of command. The split-second decisions [PAWN_pronoun] made kept the group intact while rivals fell. Since then, [PAWN_nameDef] has viewed hesitation as a death sentence.

BackstoryDef.title: backalley doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Treatment rooms were improvised from shuttered shops and storage spaces. [PAWN_nameDef] handled horrific injuries without asking questions. [PAWN_pronoun] is a master of trauma surgery, though [PAWN_possessive] bedside manner is cold and clinical.

BackstoryDef.title: relief officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Aid distribution on a dying world rarely runs smoothly. [PAWN_nameDef] calculated supply routes and ration limits with deliberate care. [PAWN_pronoun] is an expert at management, but considers manual labor to be a waste of [PAWN_possessive] focus.

BackstoryDef.title: infantryman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Drill. Reinforce. Advance. Repeat. Years of urban warfare and repetitive drills shaped [PAWN_nameDef]’s reflexes far more than theory ever could. [PAWN_pronoun] is a reliable soldier, even if [PAWN_pronoun] isn't much of a conversationalist.

BackstoryDef.title: tech rehabist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Broken devices arrived in stacks at [PAWN_nameDef]’s workshop. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in restoring what could be saved and repurposing the rest. [PAWN_pronoun] finds that machines are predictable and logical; people are significantly less so.

BackstoryDef.title: mecha-engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Precision components left little room for improvisation. [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in high-end mechanical systems requiring careful calibration. [PAWN_possessive] intense technical focus narrowed [PAWN_possessive] social interests to the point of isolation.

BackstoryDef.title: Sorrow infantry
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Mud, defensive walls, and steady rifle fire defined [PAWN_nameDef]'s years with the Company of Sorrows. [PAWN_pronoun] held lines that shifted only meters at a time, learning that adaptability in the trenches was the only thing that kept a soldier alive.

BackstoryDef.title: Sorrow heavy infantry
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Heavy armor changes how a soldier moves and thinks. [PAWN_nameDef] was trained by the Company of Sorrows to advance methodically under crushing pressure. For [PAWN_objective], endurance and a thick plate of steel outweigh the need for finesse.

BackstoryDef.title: remembrancer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Records outlast soldiers, and the Company of Sorrows required a detailed history. [PAWN_nameDef] documented campaigns and casualty reports with deliberate restraint. Having spent [PAWN_possessive] life with a pen, [PAWN_pronoun] has no interest in manual labor.

BackstoryDef.title: mender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Tools rarely stayed intact for long in the Company of Sorrows' camps. [PAWN_nameDef] repaired structures and equipment between engagements, turning endless repetition into a high-precision skill for keeping the war machine running.

BackstoryDef.title: company smith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Forge work followed the rhythm of the Company of Sorrows' deployment cycles. [PAWN_nameDef] produced blades and fittings as required by the front. [PAWN_pronoun] is as comfortable wielding a sword as [PAWN_pronoun] is a heavy smithing hammer.

BackstoryDef.title: company clerk
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Operational planning for the Company of Sorrows required careful calculation. [PAWN_nameDef] handled requisitions and internal reports with steady attention. [PAWN_pronoun] views physical labor as a task better suited for those without [PAWN_possessive] administrative talents.

BackstoryDef.title: chief forager
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Supply lines faltered often on the frontier. [PAWN_nameDef] secured food for the Company of Sorrows through hunting and controlled planting near camp boundaries. [PAWN_pronoun] values efficiency and a full stomach over personal comfort.

BackstoryDef.title: ruin haunter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned fortifications offered salvage opportunities for the Company of Sorrows. [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in entering unstable structures to extract usable materials. The constant hazard bred a decisive, fearless nature in [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Furian guard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Years of elite service structured the adult life of [PAWN_nameDef]. Rigid discipline shaped [PAWN_objective]’s instincts during long patrols and live engagements. [PAWN_pronoun] is a model of military efficiency, though [PAWN_pronoun] has little time for creative pursuits.

BackstoryDef.title: Furian officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Operational planning for the Furian military required careful calculation. In that capacity, [PAWN_nameDef] relied on cold precision when assigning units and reinforcing defensive positions. [PAWN_pronoun] leads through logic rather than charisma.

BackstoryDef.title: academy commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Measured performance drove the career of [PAWN_nameDef]. To [PAWN_objective], results mattered more than collaboration when training fresh recruits and evaluating combat readiness. [PAWN_pronoun] has no patience for failure.

BackstoryDef.title: combat doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Demanding caregiving roles shaped the work of [PAWN_nameDef]. While empathy defined [PAWN_possessive] career, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to perform complex surgeries under heavy fire, prioritizing survival over bedside manner.

BackstoryDef.title: combat engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Hazardous conditions left little room for hesitation. Working under the pressure of active bombardment, [PAWN_nameDef] developed decisive habits while repairing vital defenses and restoring power grids.

BackstoryDef.title: logistics specialist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Logistics on Fury required constant, unsentimental oversight. Within that system, [PAWN_nameDef] ensured total efficiency. [PAWN_pronoun] views manual labor as a task beneath the dignity of [PAWN_possessive] rank.

BackstoryDef.title: green engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Structured settlement initiatives attracted [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_possessive] training emphasized long-term development when stabilizing hostile land and expanding the infrastructure of Furian colonies.

BackstoryDef.title: repopulationist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Public service and the survival of the state defined [PAWN_nameDef]’s career. Consistency and restraint guided [PAWN_possessive] decisions when managing state clinics and conducting census work.

BackstoryDef.title: trench butcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Repetitive, grisly processes structured [PAWN_nameDef]’s career. Efficiency improved steadily while [PAWN_pronoun] prepared rations for frontline units and assisted in the more visceral aspects of field medicine.

BackstoryDef.title: dragonguard shield
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Rules required enforcement, and [PAWN_nameDef] fulfilled that role with an iron grip. Authority shaped [PAWN_possessive] approach within the Dragonguard's defensive formations, where [PAWN_pronoun] learned that a solid wall is more valuable than a lone hero.

BackstoryDef.title: dragonguard outcast
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Corporate contracts governed the career of [PAWN_nameDef]. Rigid procedures shaped [PAWN_possessive] priorities, making [PAWN_objective] an effective soldier but leaving [PAWN_objective] uncomfortable with improvisation or social nuance.

BackstoryDef.title: stitcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Craftsmanship defined the work of [PAWN_nameDef]. Through years of meticulous benchwork, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to assemble complex gear with total precision. [PAWN_pronoun] finds comfort in the rhythm of the needle and the lathe.

BackstoryDef.title: forgemaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the heavy industrial facilities of Hastings, efficiency mattered above all else. [PAWN_nameDef] spent decades refining [PAWN_possessive] technical precision at the forge, producing high-grade components for corporate masters.

BackstoryDef.title: ironmonger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Markets fluctuate, and [PAWN_nameDef] learned to anticipate change. Negotiation and appraisal sharpened [PAWN_possessive] instincts while trading metal goods across corporate borders. [PAWN_pronoun] has a keen eye for a deal.

BackstoryDef.title: ash cultivator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Independent study and soil recovery experiments consumed much of [PAWN_nameDef]’s adulthood. Isolation suited [PAWN_objective] perfectly while [PAWN_pronoun] attempted to coax life out of the ash-choked plains of Hastings.

BackstoryDef.title: charionblender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a field technician, [PAWN_nameDef] handled complex fabrication and repair tasks in the field. [PAWN_pronoun] finds that machines respond predictably to [PAWN_possessive] touch, which is more than [PAWN_pronoun] can say for people.

BackstoryDef.title: recordist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Estate management and logistical logs occupied much of [PAWN_nameDef]’s adulthood. Oversight became routine while maintaining inventories and formal corporate logs. [PAWN_pronoun] views manual labor as a task for those without [PAWN_possessive] education.

BackstoryDef.title: Numantian legionary
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Years of service in the Numantian legions structured the adult life of [PAWN_nameDef]. Discipline shaped [PAWN_objective]’s instincts in both the chaos of open battle and the grueling work of defensive construction.

BackstoryDef.title: legion auxiliary
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Structured auxiliary programs attracted [PAWN_nameDef] early on. [PAWN_possessive] training emphasized support roles, fortification reinforcement, and steady marksmanship to keep the ruins of Numantia secure.

BackstoryDef.title: ruin smith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Craftsmanship defined [PAWN_nameDef]'s life among the wreckage. Precision improved through repetition while [PAWN_pronoun] labored to reforge salvaged metal into usable tools and survival gear for the survivors.

BackstoryDef.title: bug farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Settlement initiatives in Numantia's harsh environments demanded adaptation. [PAWN_nameDef] learned resilience while raising livestock that others avoided, becoming an expert in the care of chitinous beasts.

BackstoryDef.title: practitionist doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Demanding caregiving roles shaped [PAWN_nameDef]. While [PAWN_pronoun] possesses a deep understanding of human anatomy, [PAWN_possessive] approach to treatment is clinical, analytical, and entirely devoid of warmth.

BackstoryDef.title: gunsmith master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the industrial workshops of the Numantian ruins, efficiency mattered above all else. Working there, [PAWN_nameDef] refined technical precision in firearm production, mastering the art of the perfect shot.

BackstoryDef.title: salvage smith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Repetitive forge processes structured the career of [PAWN_nameDef]. Efficiency improved steadily despite a constant lack of quality materials, forcing [PAWN_objective] to become a master of making do.

BackstoryDef.title: free ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Frontier patrols in the wastes required constant adaptability. [PAWN_nameDef] learned resilience and steady marksmanship while tracking threats across the jagged Numantian landscape.

BackstoryDef.title: salvage reclaimer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Hazardous ruins left little room for hesitation. Working under the constant threat of collapse, [PAWN_nameDef] developed decisive habits while extracting rare materials from the bones of the old world.

BackstoryDef.title: legionary scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Field assignments for the Pelagian forces demanded absolute precision. [PAWN_nameDef] relied on calculated movement and steady aim to navigate hostile terrain, becoming an expert at tracking both man and beast.

BackstoryDef.title: recycler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Industrial recovery operations required constant oversight. Within the Pelagian salvage yards, [PAWN_nameDef] ensured every scrap of metal was repurposed. [PAWN_pronoun] views waste as a moral failing of the highest order.

BackstoryDef.title: mech cultist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Independent study of the machine consumed much of [PAWN_nameDef]’s adulthood. Isolation suited [PAWN_objective] while refining [PAWN_possessive] mechanical knowledge, though it left [PAWN_objective] poorly equipped for social graces.

BackstoryDef.title: field armorer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Craftsmanship defined the trade of [PAWN_nameDef]. Through years of maintaining the Legion's gear, [PAWN_pronoun] learned that a warrior's life is only as good as the steel [PAWN_pronoun] wears. Precision and repetition were [PAWN_possessive] only teachers.

BackstoryDef.title: rogue militia
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Measured performance drove [PAWN_nameDef]’s involvement in the unsanctioned militia ranks. To [PAWN_objective], results and tactical victories mattered far more than reputation or the favor of the high command.

BackstoryDef.title: conspiracist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Operational calculations shaped much of [PAWN_nameDef]’s adult life. [PAWN_pronoun] spent years evaluating risks and hidden alliances, treating every conversation like a tactical deployment. [PAWN_pronoun] is always watching for the knife in the dark.

BackstoryDef.title: loyalist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Rules required enforcement, and [PAWN_nameDef] took pride in upholding them. Authority shaped [PAWN_possessive] approach to disputes, and [PAWN_pronoun] became known for a rigid, uncompromising brand of discipline.

BackstoryDef.title: regiment commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Crisis elevated [PAWN_nameDef] into a position of leadership. Decisive choices made under fire strengthened [PAWN_possessive] resolve and cemented [PAWN_possessive] reputation as a commander who would not break.

BackstoryDef.title: Black Lion infantry
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Years of regimented service in the Black Lions structured the adult life of [PAWN_nameDef]. Constant drills shaped [PAWN_possessive] reflexes and endurance, turning [PAWN_objective] into a reliable, if hardened, soldier.

BackstoryDef.title: freelance engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a field technician, [PAWN_nameDef] handled complex structural repairs in high-pressure combat zones. [PAWN_pronoun] finds that machines respond predictably to [PAWN_possessive] touch, unlike the erratic people [PAWN_pronoun] works with.

BackstoryDef.title: factory farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Industrial agriculture on Ramaal required careful efficiency. Working in the hydroponics bays, [PAWN_nameDef] refined both cultivation and structural maintenance skills to keep the colony fed.

BackstoryDef.title: Black Lion commando
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Hazardous missions left little room for hesitation. Working under extreme pressure, [PAWN_nameDef] developed the decisive combat habits and lethal efficiency required of the Black Lion's elite.

BackstoryDef.title: provision officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Logistics required constant oversight within the Ramaal military. [PAWN_nameDef] ensured a steady flow of supplies, though [PAWN_pronoun] considers the physical labor of moving crates to be beneath [PAWN_possessive] station.

BackstoryDef.title: regiment fixer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In a world where markets and morale both fluctuate, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to anticipate change. [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in stabilizing internal disputes and managing resources through informal, often illicit, channels.

BackstoryDef.title: ranger deserter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Frontier operations once demanded everything from [PAWN_nameDef]. Leaving that rigid structure behind required a resilience of a different kind, leaving [PAWN_objective] wary of authority and fiercely independent.

BackstoryDef.title: glassing survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The hazardous devastation of the glassing left little room for hesitation. Working through the reconstruction of [PAWN_possessive] world, [PAWN_nameDef] developed the decisive habits and practical skills of a true pioneer.

BackstoryDef.title: crimson commissar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Rules required enforcement, and [PAWN_nameDef] fulfilled that role with an iron hand. Authority shaped [PAWN_possessive] approach to political oversight, ensuring the Party's will was met through both rhetoric and, when necessary, a sidearm.

BackstoryDef.title: comrade engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Industrial production for the state required absolute efficiency. Working in the Great Foundries, [PAWN_nameDef] refined [PAWN_possessive] technical precision in construction and fabrication to meet the ever-increasing quotas of the Republic.

BackstoryDef.title: party archivist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: State management and archival oversight occupied much of [PAWN_nameDef]’s adulthood. Supervision of records and historical "correction" became routine. [PAWN_pronoun] views manual labor as a task for those with less revolutionary minds.

BackstoryDef.title: vodka merchant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Markets fluctuate, even in a command economy. [PAWN_nameDef] learned to anticipate these shifts by trading "surplus" spirits. Negotiation and the reading of social cues sharpened [PAWN_possessive] instincts in the black market.

BackstoryDef.title: old guard holdout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Measured loyalty defined much of [PAWN_nameDef]’s adult life. Having survived multiple purges and regime shifts, [PAWN_pronoun] learned that practical results and survival matter far more than the slogans of shifting alliances.

BackstoryDef.title: redwall builder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Repetitive construction processes structured the career of [PAWN_nameDef]. Efficiency improved steadily while [PAWN_pronoun] labored on the massive Redwall fortifications, mining the very stone [PAWN_pronoun] used to reinforce the Republic's borders.
